item.name: Sales Insights
Crm Rest Api/Crm Sales Intelligence Api/11.13.18.05
Get facts about the activity effectiveness

query.description: To identify: A CRM object record by ObjectType and ObjectId values. Example: ObjectType=lead;ObjectId=999999999

request.description: This method is used to get the record level facts about the activity effectiveness of a record.
